# duration

**Instance Property**

The amount of time, in seconds, that the alert is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var duration: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

Set `duration` to zero to display the alert until dismissed by the user. When `duration` is not zero, [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNavigationAlertMinimumDuration] determines the minimum amount of time the alert is visible.

## Getting the Alert Duration

- **CPNavigationAlertMinimumDuration**: A constant that defines the minimum amount of time that an alert is visible.
